title: Duck breast and courgette tournedos
description: This recipe for duck coupled with fresh courgette is a gorgeous summer barbecue dish, that can be cooked on a griddle for rainy days.A tournedo is classically a cut of beef fillet, usually a cylinder measuring 6cm/2½in x  6cm/2½in. This recipe recreates that form with slices of duck and courgettes rolled up instead.
ingredients: 1 tbsp herbs de Provence (usually marjoram, oregano, rosemary, thyme)
